languages.text: "Оказаться в центре расследования Инквизиции можете и вы, Вольный Торговец. Будьте осмотрительны".
"You, too, may find yourself at the centre of an investigation, Rogue Trader. Be cautious."
languages.original_text: "Оказаться в центре расследования Инквизиции можете и вы, Вольный Торговец. Будьте осмотрительны".

traits.locale_text: "You too may find yourself at the centre of an investigation, Rogue Trader. Be cautious."
"You too may find yourself at the centre of an investigation, Rogue Trader. Be cautious."
"You, too, may find yourself at the centre of an investigation, Rogue Trader. Be cautious."
"You, too, may find yourself at the centre of an investigation, Rogue Trader. Be cautious."
"You, too, may find yourself at the centre of an investigation, Rogue Trader. Be cautious."
"You, too, may find yourself at the centre of an investigation, Rogue Trader. Be cautious."

languages.text: 「自由開拓者、あなたも調査の対象になるかもしれない。気を付けることだ」
languages.original_text: "You, too, may find yourself at the centre of an investigation, Rogue Trader. Be cautious."

traits.locale_text: 「自由開拓者、あなたも調査の対象になるかもしれない。気を付けることだ」

languages.text: « Vous pourriez vous aussi faire l'objet d'une enquête, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}. Méfiez-vous. »
languages.original_text: "You, too, may find yourself at the centre of an investigation, Rogue Trader. Be cautious."

traits.locale_text: « Vous pourriez vous aussi faire l'objet d'une enquête, {mf|libre-marchand|libre-marchande}. Méfiez-vous. »

languages.text: “你也可能会成为被调查的目标，行商浪人。你最好当心点。”
languages.original_text: "You, too, may find yourself at the centre of an investigation, Rogue Trader. Be cautious."

traits.locale_text: “你也可能会成为被调查的目标，行商浪人。你最好当心点。”

languages.text: "Auch Ihr könntet zum Mittelpunkt einer Untersuchung werden, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}. Seid wachsam."
languages.original_text: "You, too, may find yourself at the centre of an investigation, Rogue Trader. Be cautious."

traits.locale_text: "Auch Ihr könntet zum Mittelpunkt einer Untersuchung werden, {mf|Freihändler|Freihändlerin}. Seid wachsam."

languages.text: «Sea prudente, Comerciante Independiente, puede que hasta {mf|lo|la} estén investigando a usted».
languages.original_text: "You, too, may find yourself at the centre of an investigation, Rogue Trader. Be cautious."

traits.locale_text: «Sea prudente, Comerciante Independiente, puede que hasta {mf|lo|la} estén investigando a usted».

languages.text: "Aksi takdirde soruşturmanın sonraki nesnesi siz olabilirsiniz Hür Tacir. Ayağınızı denk alın."
languages.original_text: "You, too, may find yourself at the centre of an investigation, Rogue Trader. Be cautious."

traits.locale_text: "Aksi takdirde soruşturmanın sonraki nesnesi siz olabilirsiniz Hür Tacir. Ayağınızı denk alın."
